Title: Verify workflow creation and node connection
Description:
Ensure that a user can create a new workflow and visually connect nodes on the workflow blueprint canvas.
This test case covers the creation of a workflow and the ability to establish process flows between nodes.
Preconditions: User is logged into the Ascendion platform and navigated to the Build > Workflows section.
Test Steps:
1. Click on 'Build' in the left sidebar.
2. Click on 'Workflows' from the top navigation bar.
3. Create a new workflow and name it (e.g., 'wf-1').
4. Add at least two nodes to the workflow canvas (e.g., 'trip' and 'Layman Language').
5. Connect the nodes to establish a process flow.
Expected Result: A new workflow is created and the nodes are visually connected on the blueprint canvas.

Title: Verify file upload functionality for workflow inputs
Description:
Ensure that users can upload supported file types as workflow inputs.
This test case covers the file upload feature and validation for allowed file formats.
Preconditions: User is logged into the Ascendion platform and has an active workflow open.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the workflow info panel.
2. Click on the 'Upload' button under Workflow Inputs.
3. Select a supported file type (e.g., zip, ppt, pptx, csv, doc, docx, xlsx, txt, pdf).
4. Confirm the upload.
Expected Result: The selected file is successfully uploaded and listed as an input for the workflow.

Title: Verify 'Send for Approval' button functionality
Description:
Ensure that the 'Send for Approval' button is enabled and submits the workflow for approval when clicked.
This test case covers the approval submission process.
Preconditions: User is logged into the Ascendion platform and has a valid workflow open.
Test Steps:
1. Ensure the workflow is complete and all required inputs are provided.
2. Click the 'Send for Approval' button in the top right corner.
Expected Result: The workflow is submitted for approval and a confirmation message is displayed.

Title: Verify 'Download' button is disabled when workflow is incomplete
Description:
Ensure that the 'Download' button remains disabled when the workflow is incomplete or missing required inputs.
This test case covers the conditional enabling/disabling of the download feature.
Preconditions: User is logged into the Ascendion platform and has an incomplete workflow open.
Test Steps:
1. Open a workflow that is missing required inputs or steps.
2. Observe the state of the 'Download' button in the top right corner.
Expected Result: The 'Download' button is disabled and cannot be clicked.

Title: Verify navigation through sidebar options
Description:
Ensure that users can navigate to different sections (Home, Build, Execute, Approve, Manage, Analytics, Account) using the left sidebar.
This test case covers sidebar navigation and page loading.
Preconditions: User is logged into the Ascendion platform.
Test Steps:
1. Click each option in the left sidebar sequentially.
2. Verify that the corresponding page loads for each option.
Expected Result: Each sidebar option navigates to the correct section and loads the appropriate page.
